wine_varietals.name: Cabernet Sauvignon
wine_varietals.description: Bold, full-bodied, with dark fruit flavors and firm tannins.

wine_varietals.name: Chardonnay
wine_varietals.description: Buttery and oaky or crisp and citrusy, depending on the style.

wine_varietals.name: Gewürztraminer
wine_varietals.description: Floral and spicy, often off-dry, with lychee and honeysuckle notes.

wine_varietals.name: Malbec
wine_varietals.description: Deep-colored with blackberry, plum, and chocolate flavors.

wine_varietals.name: Merlot
wine_varietals.description: Smooth and medium-bodied with plum, black cherry, and herbal notes.

wine_varietals.name: Pinot Grigio/Pinot Gris
wine_varietals.description: Light and zesty with green apple and pear flavors.

wine_varietals.name: Pinot Noir
wine_varietals.description: Light-bodied with red berry flavors and earthy undertones.

wine_varietals.name: Provence Rosé
wine_varietals.description: Light, dry, and crisp with red berry and citrus flavors.

wine_varietals.name: Riesling
wine_varietals.description: Aromatic and high-acid, ranging from dry to sweet.

wine_varietals.name: Sangiovese
wine_varietals.description: The backbone of Chianti, featuring cherry, tomato, and herbal flavors.

wine_varietals.name: Sauvignon Blanc
wine_varietals.description: Crisp and refreshing with grassy, citrus, and tropical notes.

wine_varietals.name: Syrah/Shiraz
wine_varietals.description: Rich and full-bodied with dark fruit flavors, pepper, and smoky notes.

wine_varietals.name: Tempranillo
wine_varietals.description: Spain’s signature grape, offering red fruit, tobacco, and leather notes.

wine_varietals.name: Viognier
wine_varietals.description: Rich and aromatic with peach, apricot, and floral notes.

wine_varietals.name: White Zinfandel
wine_varietals.description: Sweet and fruity with strawberry and melon notes.

wine_varietals.name: Zinfandel
wine_varietals.description: Jammy and fruit-forward with spicy and peppery notes.
